nodes.text: Billibango was a male Xexto from Troiken who supported the Galactic Republic during the final decades of the Republic Classic era.

Unlike many of the other members of his species, he did not dislike the Jedi, and in fact wished to be one. In 44 BBY, during the Stark Hyperspace War, he helped the Republic force at Mount Avos by providing them with information on the mountain and its challat eaters. During the fourth battle in the Qotile system, Billibango grabbed an active part in the battle scene and saved the lives of soldiers, including Jace Dallin.
